body_html:
Are you getting the same error after making those changes?
Can you change https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/CMakeLists.txt#L135 to ON instead of OFF (there's no easy way to propogate flags through setup.py).
body_text:
Are you getting the same error after making those changes?
Can you change https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/CMakeLists.txt#L135 to ON instead of OFF (there's no easy way to propogate flags through setup.py).
body:
Are you getting the same error after making those changes?
Can you change https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/CMakeLists.txt#L135 to ON instead of OFF (there's no easy way to propogate flags through setup.py).
